DOC.brief_summary: The evaluation determine professional clinical accuracy compare OneTouch® Verio™Pro+ blood glucose result YSI 2300 analyzer . `` Professional Clinical Accuracy '' define accuracy system use train healthcare professional .
DOC.brief_title: OneTouch® Verio™Pro+ Blood Glucose Monitoring System Clinical Accuracy Study China
DOC.criteria: Subject least 18 year age . Subject diagnose diabetes mellitus ( type 1 type 2 diabetes ) Subject agree sign two ( 2 ) copy Subject Informed Consent Form follow procedure study . Subject agree allow HCP perform finger stick blood glucose test meter YSI instrument . Up one retry finger stick need event insufficient blood collect test failure . Subject agree allow HCP perform venous puncture blood glucose test meter YSI instrument , haematocrit ( HCT ) test . Up one retry venous puncture need event insufficient blood collect test failure . Subject agree provide demographic medical history information give access medical record appropriate . Subject currently work , previously work , immediate family member work company manufacture and/or marketing blood glucose monitoring product . Subject already participate study . Subject know pregnant
